channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Hoist Rescue; INC#1587; 06:27PM; 7600 W Verdugo Crestline Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/49WiHw9; #Tujunga; Firefighters located a 29-year-old female in a remote area with a lower leg injury. Ground crews were unable to bring apparatus to the patient's location, therefore LAFD Air Operations utilized a hoist operation. A rescuer was lowered down to the patient to assess, treat, and prepare the patient for a hoist. LAFD Air Operations transported the patient by air to a local hospital. Nothing further.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 E24 E274 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 PB74 RA7 RA74 RH114 SO1 T74; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Technical Rescue; INC#0997; 02:15PM; 11250 W Wentworth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39Oo2M8; #ShadowHills; Firefighters located one horse stuck in the mud, with the owner nearby, in a remote area of the Hansen Dam Recreation Area. Crews diverted some of the water, used shovels to partially dig the horse out, then used a tow strap and a team of firefighters to pull the horse free. LA Animal Services' Specialized Mobile Animal Rescue Team (SMART) responded and evaluated the horse. Thankfully, the horse was okay and no veterinary care was needed. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 CM40 CM42 E288 E289 E298 E98 EM14 H6 HA6 HR3 PI2 PI4 RA803 RA889 RA90 RA98 SO1 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Technical Rescue; INC#0997; 12:39PM; 11250 W Wentworth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39Oo2M8; #ShadowHills; Firefighters are responding to a remote area of the Hansen Dam Recreation Area for reports of a horse stuck and needs to be rescued. Due to trees overhead, helicopters are unable to help with a hoist. Ground crews are working on getting rescue equipment to the remote area (east of the Flood Control Basin, near the Tujunga Wash), which cannot be accessed by fire engines.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 CM40 CM42 E288 E289 E298 E98 EM14 H6 HA6 HR3 RA803 RA889 RA90 SO1 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Technical Rescue - Fatality; INC#0762; 10:39AM; Berth 270; MAP: https://bit.ly/48YIcMm; #SanPedro; Firefighters received reports of a worker trapped under a fork lift. Upon arrival, firefighters found the trapped person to be deceased. Urban Search and Rescue specialists will continue their response to assist with safely removing the heavy machinery from the site, to allow other agencies (CalOSHA, Law Enforcement and the Medical Examiner) to conduct their investigation. No transport. Nothing further.; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District outside city; BC13 BC6 BT2 BT3 E205 E238 E285 E38 E40 E48 E5 E85 EM1 HR3 RA101 RA112 RA5 RA803 T38 T48 T5 UR5 UR85 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Auto Rollover; INC#1480; 07:31PM; 17000 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x0Q9Dq; #NorthHills; LAFD responded to a four-vehicle collision with rollover. Firefighters/Paramedics transported 5 patients total from the scene to the hospital (2 serious, 3 fair). Unknown ages/genders/conditions. Nothing further.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E287 E70 E87 EM10 EM15 RA18 RA828 RA87 RA903 T87; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1226; 05:21PM; 1020 W Bartlett St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3viSmth; #Chinatown; *Corrected Address* Firefighters found heavy fire in one (boarded-up) duplex, which was exposing the neighboring (also boarded-up) duplex to intense heat and flames. Twenty-six firefighters used defensive tactics to extinguish the flames in 14 minutes. The fire unit was destroyed, but the adjacent unit only sustained damage to the exterior. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E20 E211 E220 E3 E4 RA20 RA803 SQ21 T11 T20 T9; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1226; 05:07PM; 1030 W Alpine St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48ZcXkd; #Chinatown; *Tentative Address* One-story duplex with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E20 E211 E220 E3 E4 RA20 RA803 SQ21 T11 T20 T9; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1013; 04:05PM; WB 10 Fwy x Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49T4nVx; #UniversityPark; Seven people were injured as a result of a two-vehicle collision, with rollover. Firefighter extricated one trapped adult from the wreckage. Firefighter/Paramedics evaluated, treated, and transported 5 patients in serious-to-critical condition to a nearby trauma center (3 month-old male, 6 year-old male, 7 year-old male, 10 year-old male, and 29-year-old female). One patient was evaluated and released on scene (adult male), and one was found deceased at the scene (adult male). CHP Log #1764. Nothing further.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E209 E210 E26 E9 EM11 EM13 EM5 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA14 RA15 RA26 RA810 RA9 T10; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1013; 03:07PM; WB 10 Fwy x Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49T4nVx; #UniversityPark; Two-vehicle collision with at least five patients being evaluated, and one deceased (6 total).; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E209 E210 E26 E9 EM11 EM13 EM5 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA14 RA15 RA26 RA810 RA9 T10; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1494; 08:07PM; 5931 N Reseda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PolPJh; #Tarzana; Firefighters quickly extinguished a fire in one unit caused by an oven. There are no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E100 E273 E290 E73 E93 RA100 RA93 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Connor Thompson
